articles.title: Martin Amis, writer, 1949-2023 - Financial Times
articles.description: The British novelist whose swagger and love of literary pyrotechnics produced dazzling, sardonic prose
articles.content:
If youve read my novels, you already know absolutely everything about me, wrote Martin Amis in Inside Story, his 15th and final novel, published in 2020.
